alert.note: Alert for Clark (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 5:56PM CDT until July 14 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: The National Weather Service in La Crosse has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Clark County in central Wisconsin... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 556 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles south of Stanley, or 24 miles northwest of Neillsville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Greenwood around 630 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Hog Corners, Mead Lake, Sterling Avenue And Starks Road, Tioga, Seven Sister Mounds, Globe and The Blue Swamp. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
